name: Pinball Disc Room
description:
How did you end up in this pinball of death? The blades teleport in. Dodge the discs to survive. Knock down the popups to open the passage way but beware you can't control when you exit.

This was created for the Disc Room Game Jam.

Arrow keys control movement. Space starts the game. Escape quits the game. In Linux or Windows version, tab toggles full screen.

Liberation font is under SIL Open Font License (OFL).

Death sounds are by HaelDB and licensed under CC0.
Spawn sounds are by bart and licensed under CC0.
Disc is from Industrial Traps 2D - Sidescroller by LarryIRL and licensed under CC0.
Effect on disc appearing is from Radial lightning effect by 13rice and licensed uder CC0.
Player is scaled up from low-pixel fighters (top-view) by Lasse Öörni & Olli Niemitalo (BOFH graphics team) and licensed under CC-BY 3.0
Blood splats are cut from Blood Splatter by ExileGL and licensed under CC0.
Sparks are from Hit Animation | Frame by frame by Sinestesia and licensed under CC0.
new_ball.wav and award.wav are from Professor Pinball's Castle and licensed under MIT.
